name: 解决preference web ui打开可能失败的问题
body: 始终使用safari浏览器打开输入法配置页面。

name: sort pinyin/hanzi/english by Google pinyin dictionary frequency
body: 调整输入拼音时输出的英文翻译顺序，按该拼音对应的汉字词频来排序。

name: 输入汉语拼音，输出拼音对应的英语翻译列表
解决翻译调取错误 issues/25
provide a web ui to config preference
body: 现在可以通过点击 preferences ---> 配置页面---> 配置是否显示翻译列表。

name: v1.2.1
body: keep the annotation/translation window visible in screen viewport.

name: v1.2.0
body: fix bug: reset all state and hide all windows when deactivateServer event triggered

name: v1.1.9
body:
1. using [marisa-trie](http://s-yata.github.io/marisa-trie/docs/readme.en.html) to reduce memory, and to reduce the time needed to build the trie.
2. turn it from a `Objective-C` project to a `Objective-C++` project, so we can mix C++ and Objective-C code.

name: esc键取消输入
body: fix https://github.com/dongyuwei/hallelujahIM/issues/18

name: 解决标点符号输入的问题
body:
fix issues:
1. https://github.com/dongyuwei/hallelujahIM/issues/12
2. https://github.com/dongyuwei/hallelujahIM/issues/14   
3. https://github.com/dongyuwei/hallelujahIM/issues/15

1. 使用空格选词后自动附加一个空格（enter回车选词不附加空格）；
2. 解决输入英文单词后连续输入标点符号的bug。

name: fix issues/11 shift and caps lock
body: 解决shift 和 caps lock输入的bug。

name: 支持空格选词
body:
1. 支持空格选词；
2. 解决command+X （如command + v， command + a） 在Chrome及Safari浏览器等app中的bug。

name: use custom window to show translations for macOS Sierra v10.12
body: use custom window to show translations for macOS Sierra v10.12

name: fix bug
body: fix bug: commond+v can't paste

name: 支持OS X Sierra系统
body:
fix选词问题。
todo：二级翻译列表依然无法正常展现了。

name: text expander and google suggestions
body:
1. Add text expander feature: load user defined substitutions from `~/.you_expand_me.json`
2. Add google suggestions feature for any word which has prefix `gs`.

name: hallelujah v1.0.8
body: reduce memory usage(use PJTernarySearchTree to replace NDTrie).

name: hallelujah v1.0.7
body: show Phonetic Symbol with translation.

name: hallelujah v1.0.6
body: with translation function.

name: hallelujah-v1.0.4
body:
1. support upper case characters in auto-suggestion mode
2. password mode: make `zhima` case insensitive

name: hallelujah-v1.0.3
body: fix cursor position bug

name: hallelujah-v1.0.2
body:
hallelujahIM branch with **password manager** feature.
tested on mac 10.9.4 and 10.10
1. unzip the app, copy it to /Library/Input\ Methods/ or ~/Library/Input\ Methods/
2. go to System Preferences --> Input Sources --> click the + --> select English --> select hallelujah

name: hallelujahIM-v1.0.0
body:
tested on mac 10.9.4 and 10.10
1. unzip the app, copy it to `/Library/Input\ Methods/` or `~/Library/Input\ Methods/`
2. go to **System Preferences**  --> **Input Sources** --> click the `+` --> select **English** --> select **hallelujah**
